name: Tanksmas
description:
• Endless wars of tanks in the theme of Christmas !

    Tanksmas is a multimode tank shooter game in the theme of xmas for both Android and Windows 32/64bit. fully packed with 4 modes ! (well 2 modes currently)

    Singleplayer :

    • Continuous mode : Survive endless waves of enemy tanks and bosses on your wave and see how long you can last in the field and fight for the highest score ( GameJolt Leaderboard )
    • Story mode ( COMING SOON ) : ???

      Multiplayer Local-(One Screen)

    • TopView Arena : Choose a map or make your own using the included level editor and fight to the death !
    • Co-operative mode ( COMING SOON )

      Credits :

    • ali8888/DaGreenGem : Programming and Game dev
    • KenneyNL : for providing free assets packs !
    • Kevin MacLeod : for providing free music tracks !
    • freesound.org : for providing a variety of sound effects
    • Evil Mind Entertainment for some really good music.. worth buying !
  • Note : Please if you happen to have encountered a bug, especially one that crashes the game. Leave a comment !

    #multiplayer #shooter #survival #arcade #action
